scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npx tsc && npx rollup --config
scripts.all-tests: npm i && npm run format && npm run lint && deno publish --unstable-sloppy-imports --dry-run && npm run test && npm run build && npm run test-doc && bun upgrade --stable && bun run test-bun
scripts.doc: npx typedoc --name Journalism --includeVersion --readme none --out docs src/index.ts
scripts.update-doc: npm run doc && git add -A && git commit -m 'Updating doc' && git push
scripts.publish-patch-no-test: git branch --show-current | grep -q '^main$' && npm run build && npm version patch && npm run update-doc && npm publish && deno run -A syncJsrVersion.js && git pull && git add -A && git commit -m 'Syncing NPM/JSR versions' && deno publish --unstable-sloppy-imports
scripts.publish-patch: git branch --show-current | grep -q '^main$' && npm run all-tests && npm version patch && npm run update-doc && npm publish && deno run -A syncJsrVersion.js && git pull && git add -A && git commit -m 'Syncing NPM/JSR versions' && deno publish --unstable-sloppy-imports
scripts.publish-minor: git branch --show-current | grep -q '^main$' && npm run all-tests && npm version minor && npm run update-doc && npm publish && deno run -A syncJsrVersion.js && git pull && git add -A && git commit -m 'Syncing NPM/JSR versions' && deno publish --unstable-sloppy-imports
scripts.publish-major: git branch --show-current | grep -q '^main$' && npm run all-tests && npm version major && npm run update-doc && npm publish && deno run -A syncJsrVersion.js && git pull && git add -A && git commit -m 'Syncing NPM/JSR versions' && deno publish --unstable-sloppy-imports
scripts.publish-prerelease: npm run all-tests && npm version prerelease --preid rc && npm run build && npm run update-doc && npm publish --tag next
